caption:
Table 1: Results of ablation tests on the COCO test split. All the models are 
trained with the XE loss and finetuned by the CIDEr optimization.

Table 2: Offline results evaluated on the COCO Karpathy test split. 'V. E. type' 
indicates the type of visual features; '# VL Data' is the number of image-text 
pairs used for vision-language pretraining.
